title: Buying specialized or expensive pet food
context: Ask a store employee where the grain-free or raw diet dog food is.

content.bestLine: Where is the grain-free dog food?

neutral.text: I'm looking for grain-free dog food
Do you carry raw diet dog food?
Where can I find the specialty pet food?
I need help finding the grain-free section
Can you show me the organic pet food options?
Where is the natural pet food aisle?
Do you have any high-end dog food brands?
I'm searching for a specific type of dog food

informal.text: Hey, where's the good stuff for dogs?
I'm trying to find some fancy dog food
Do you guys have any of that raw dog food?
Where's the grain-free dog food at?
I'm looking for some top-notch dog food
Can you help me find the best dog food?
I need some advice on dog food
What's the deal with grain-free dog food?

formal.text: I would like to inquire about your grain-free dog food options
Could you please direct me to the raw diet dog food section?
I am seeking recommendations for high-quality dog food
Where might I find the specialty pet food section?
I would appreciate assistance in locating the organic pet food options
Could you please inform me about your natural pet food selection?

patterns.meaning: asking for the location of a specific type of dog food
inquiring about the availability of a specific type of dog food

dialogs.description: Customer asking for grain-free dog food

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Excuse me, where is the grain-free dog food?

dialogs.description: Customer inquiring about raw diet dog food

lines.speaker: Customer
lines.text: Do you carry raw diet dog food?

lines.speaker: Employee
lines.text: Yes, we have a few options. Let me show you
